Name: Beyond The Gates
About the game: Beyond The Gates is a 2-4 player online co-op horror which mainly focuses on the story line. Discover the truth behind a dark mystery that has been hidden until now. Strange Disappearances There had been strange disappearances in the village during the last few years, People that went to the castle didn't return and there had been no news from the castle itself, it's like everyone is dead. I'm heading to the castle to find out what is going on, everyone is trying to warn me about an apparent evil. I just hope I will return safely and find out what the hell is going on in that damn castle. Single player mode In this mode you can try to solve the mystery on your own, only for the hardcore horror experience. Online Co-Op In this mode you and your friends will try to solve the mystery, you must work together because this game requires teamwork. Continued story line With each update the main story line will be continued and improved upon, with new features and mechanics. Insane difficulty Are you having it easy beating the game on normal? Try Insane mode if you think you are brave enough. Silence Great atmospheric feeling, especially if you turn off the 'ambient noise' you will hear nothing but dead silence. Replayability Each playthrough will be different, spawns are randomized ensuring maximum replayability.
